name: Shin Seiki Evangelion: Eva to Yukai na Nakama-tachi
overview: Shin Seiki Evangelion: Eva to Yukai na Nakamatachi is a mahjong game published by Gainax for the PSX and Saturn in 1998. The game features 17 characters from three animes (Evangelion, Nadia & Gunbuster): EVANGELION: - Shinji Ikari - Rei Ayanami - Asuka Langley Soryu - Misato Katsuragi - Ritsuko Akagi - Ryoji Kaji - Gendo Ikari - Kensuke Aida NADIA - THE SECRET OF BLUE WATER: - Nadia la Arwall - Jean Rocke Raltique - Marie en Carlsberg - Electra - King GUNBUSTER: - Noriko Takaya - Kazumi Amano - Koichiro "Coach" Ota - Jung Freud
